SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.deck

Class RevisionReverseFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.deck.RevisionReverseFXMLController
@Component public class RevisionReverseFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for managing the reverse revision of cards in a deck.

This class facilitates a revision session where the back (translation) of a card is shown first, allowing the user to guess the front (word). It supports options for handling revision based on the deck's revision algorithm.

      Handles the button click event during the revision session. Updates the card revision state and loads the next card.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the card.
      Parameters:
      button - The button that was clicked.
      reverseStrategy - The reverse text mode revision strategy.
